http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif CREATIVESCIENCE List CREATIVESCIENCE List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=CREATIVESCIENCE&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=CREATIVESCIENCE.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-12T10:28:24Z Estefan\ufffd\ufffda Aguilar Moreno 2015-03-12T11:18:20+01:00 2015-03-12T11:18:20+01:00 GEOTHNK International Scenario Contest https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;966d4ddf.1503 *apologies for cross-posting*<br><br>*GEOTHNK International Scenario Contest*<br><br>http://goo.gl/WhfQzm<br><br>Open until 30th april 2015 JiscMail Helpline 2015-03-06T13:57:20+00:00 2015-03-06T13:57:20+00:00 REMINDER: New List Owner required for: CREATIVESCIENCE JiscMail List https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;b09ee820.1503 We require an existing subscriber(s) of this list to take over the running of the list.<br><br>To continue to provide this mailing list we need to find a new list owner, if a subscriber(s) from a UK Educational/Research Organisation wants to volunteer to take over the management of this list please check that you meet the criteria for running a list: https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/groups/startagroup/grouprequestform.html and if you do contact helpline@jiscmail.ac.uk as soon as you possibly can contact us. [...] Suzon Fuks 2015-03-06T18:45:58+10:00 2015-03-06T18:45:58+10:00 reminder -14 March https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;20de6f96.1503 This is a reminder.<br>Deadline for submitting works to the<br>virtual exhibition "HOT WATER \ufffd\ufffd Water, Peace & War"<br>is 14 March 2015.<br>~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~<br><br>Artists, scientists, activists, teachers, youth are invited to upload<br>Videos, digital postcards, poems or texts on the theme of \ufffd\ufffdHOT WATER\ufffd\ufffd:<br>climate change, environmental decline, rights violations, volatile<br>politics and conflict about water.<br>INFO http://bit.ly/HOT-WATER [...] JiscMail Helpline 2015-02-20T12:11:32+00:00 2015-02-20T12:11:32+00:00 New List Owner required for: CREATIVESCIENCE JiscMail List https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;61797594.1502 The JiscMail Helpline team have tried to contact the list owners of CREATIVESCIENCE, but the message we sent bounced.<br><br>To continue to provide this mailing list we need to find a new list owner, if a subscriber(s) from a UK Educational/Research Organisation wants to volunteer to take over the management of this list please check that you meet the criteria for running a list: https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/groups/startagroup/grouprequestform.html and if you do contact helpline@jiscmail.ac.uk before Friday, 13th March 2015. [...] Suzon Fuks 2015-02-20T18:30:21+10:00 2015-02-20T18:30:21+10:00 call to virtual exhibition - deadline extended https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;5541d732.1502 I'd like to inform you that the deadline for submitting works to the<br>virtual exhibition "HOT WATER \ufffd\ufffd Water, Peace & War" has been extended to<br>the 14 March 2015.<br>~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~<br><br>Artists, scientists, activists, teachers, youth are invited to upload<br>videos, digital postcards, poems or texts on the theme of \ufffd\ufffdHOT WATER\ufffd\ufffd:<br>climate change, environmental decline, rights violations, volatile<br>politics and conflict about water.<br>INFO http://bit.ly/HOT-WATER [...] STEM 2014-09-23T09:58:07+00:00 2014-09-23T09:58:07+00:00 HEA New to teaching workshop: Building career foundations - 2nd October - Leicester Conference Centre https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;34fbd0cd.1409 ****Apologies for cross-posting****<br><br>HEA New to teaching workshop: Building career foundations<br><br>2 October 2014, Leicester Conference Centre<br><br>Dr Ruth Pilkington<br><br>This day-long event combines a keynote presentation from former Head of Learning and Teaching Policy at HEFCE, William Locke, on the changing nature of academic careers in higher education, with two 2-hour new-to-teaching sessions. [...] Bellin, Stefano 2014-08-30T21:14:26+00:00 2014-08-30T21:14:26+00:00 UCL Humanity and Animality Conference - REGISTRATION NOW OPEN https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;dce87914.1408 Dear All,<br><br>Registration for the UCL Humanity and Animality conference is now open. Please find the registration details and the conference programme at: http://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/humanity-and-animality-in-20th-and-21st-century-culture-narratives-theories-histories-an-tickets-12769440741?aff=es2<br><br>If you are interested in attending the conference, please choose the session(s) you would like attend from the multiple choice menu.<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdMany thanks and best wishes,<br>[https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/RnNZfQn2o2xpggJQqefCOervMbPIci5mujDPJnvl43kv6Rtxjyh5gHN_JKVzeU-aaGz3pePFgxfoAAtZJZNx8mveVTc-11j98EfuAJVcumUenA=s0-d-e1-ft#https://ssl.gstatic.com/ui/v1/icons/mail/images/cleardot.gif][https://ssl.gstatic.com/ui/v1/icons/mail/images/cleardot.gif]<br>Stefano Bellin<br><br>University College London (UCL)<br>Joint Faculty Institute of Graduate Studies<br>in collaboration with the<br>Centre for Multidisciplinary and Intercultural Inquiry [...] Bellin, Stefano 2014-08-27T15:40:38+00:00 2014-08-27T15:40:38+00:00 Humanity and Animality Conference - REGISTRATION NOW OPEN https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;a8ff5a92.1408 Dear All,<br><br>Registration for the Humanity and Animality conference is now open. Please find the registration details and the conference programme at: http://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/humanity-and-animality-in-20th-and-21st-century-culture-narratives-theories-histories-an-tickets-12769440741?aff=es2<br><br>If you are interested in attending the conference, please choose the session(s) you would like attend from the multiple choice menu. Further information about the conference will be uploaded on the UCL JFIGS website by the end of August. [...] Bellin, Stefano 2014-07-24T10:12:54+00:00 2014-07-24T10:12:54+00:00 (reminder) CFP Humanity and Animality Interdisciplinary Conference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;541a466a.1407 Dear All,<br><br>Submissions of abstracts for the "Humanity and Animality" interdisciplinary conference is still open. Please see the Call for Papers below:<br><br>Call for papers:<br><br>University College London (UCL)<br><br>Joint Faculty Institute of Graduate Studies<br><br>Humanity and Animality in 20th and 21st Century Culture:<br><br>Narratives, Theories, Histories. An Interdisciplinary Conference<br><br>15 September, 2014<br><br>This interdisciplinary conference takes up an important debate in a field of growing importance in the humanities, where animal studies, post-humanism, and eco-criticism have surged in recent years. The definition of mankind seems necessarily to pass through an understanding of what constitutes the animal. Philosophically, what distinguishes, [...] Bellin, Stefano 2014-07-14T13:35:36+00:00 2014-07-14T13:35:36+00:00 Humanity and Animality Interdisciplinary Conference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CREATIVESCIENCE;c11ea498.1407 Dear Creative Science, I am organizing a conference on "Humanity and Animality in 20th and 21st Century Culture", which will take place at UCL on the 15th September 2014. This should be a very interesting event as we have some distinguished academics speaking at the conference and it would be a great opportunity for students and staff to participate in. Please circulate the Call for Papers. [...]
